question: The correct statement/s about Galvanic cell is/are
(a) Current flows from cathode to anode
(b) Anode is positive terminal
(c) If <katex>$E_{cell}<0$</katex>, then it is spontaneous reaction
(d) Cathode is positive terminal
explanation: In Galvanic cell: Anode is Negative, Cathode is Positive.
Current flows from Cathode to Anode (External circuit), Electrons flow Anode to Cathode.
